items.text: full just outside off, and tapped to mid-off for a quick single
full and wide outside off, and angling further away. Left alone
full, just outside off stump, and steered off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Southee to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off, and cut to point
items.shortText: Southee to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball angling in, and worked off his hips to midwicket for a single
Southee looking for the swing. Overpitched on leg stump, but going down as a wide
length ball, wide outside off, and he stands tall to punch through to extra cover
yorker on off stump, and dug back to the bowler. Menacing inswinger from Southee this time
slogged! Length ball on middle, but he backs away to make some extra room, before hammering a shot right into the cow-corner fence
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot towards point
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball on his hips, and nudged away to deep backward square for a walking single

taken at third man! Length ball on middle, and Mushi tries to flick this away to square leg. Takes a top-edge, and the ball has a lot of hang time. Allows Munro to compose himself near the boundary, and his bucket-hands make no mistake

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim c Munro b Boult 17 (47m 27b 3x4 0x6) SR: 62.96

items.text: full on off stump, and he sticks his bat out to defend towards cover point
full just outside off, and swinging inwards. Defended
items.shortText: Southee to Sabbir Rahman, no run
Southee to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.preText: Argument between Tamim and Mushfiqur in the dressing room. Wonder what they're discussing there.
items.text: length ball on middle, and he swivels to pull! Straight to Ferguson at fine-leg, but he drops this in the deep. Goes for a six, and Southee is not too pleased
items.shortText: Southee to Sabbir Rahman, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, wide outside off stump, and he steers this fine past the diving short third-man fielder!
items.shortText: Southee to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and he sticks his bat out to tap a shot towards point

items.preText: Mushfiqur has a bandaged wrist now.
items.text: full on off, and he defends with the bat's open face to point
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.preText: Abdullah: "How one player can make a huge difference, Bangladesh is missing Shakib so much. He's such an underrated player. Stability in the middle order, and getting crucial wickets when needed. It'll be very hard to replace him."
items.text: beautiful! Length ball angling away from Sabbir, and he looks to defend. But whizzes past his outside edge
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: slapped! Length ball angling away from Sabbir, and he lifts this over point for a useful boundary
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: yorker on middle, and well dug out with the straight bat. Boult dives on his followthrough to intercept
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run
